subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous king from Rajasthan led the battle against the Mughal Empire?
question_hi: राजस्थान के अलग-अलग राजाओं और पुलनवालों के राजनीतिक मुख्यतम क्या है?
explanation_en: Rao Jodha is widely known as the king who led the Battle of Mewar against the Mughal Empire. He successfully defended the kingdom of Mewar and played a crucial role in shaping Rajasthan's history.
